title: Fox_approaches
body:
You are out on a late night walk. You're feeling a bit tired, so you decide to sit down on a bench in a nearby park. #line:1111111
You suddenly see a shadow closing in on you. The light from a nearby lamp post soon reveals it to be a fox. #line:11111112
The fox is looking at you expectantly. #line:11111113
[[Stand up and walk away.|No_fox]] #line:11111114
[[Are you the one I've been waiting for? |Fox_speaks]] #line:11111115

title: No_fox
body:
The fox follows you with its' eyes as you walk away. #line:11111121
You see how the fox disappears back into the shadows. #line:11111122

title: Fox_speaks
body:
The fox speaks to you. #line:11111131
Follow me. I will show you da wae. #line:11111132
The End #line:11111133
